title: BRIEF-Alexion Says No Compulsory License Of Soliris Was Requested Or Granted In Brazil
text:
April 20, 2018 / 7:40 PM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Alexion Says No Compulsory License Of Soliris Was Requested Or Granted In Brazil Reuters Staff 
April 20 (Reuters) - Alexion Pharmaceuticals Inc: 
* ALEXION PROVIDES STATEMENT ON SUPERIOR COURT OF JUSTICE (STJ) DECISION IN BRAZIL INVOLVING SOLIRISÂ® (ECULIZUMAB) 
* ALEXION PHARMACEUTICALS - ALEXION WOULD LIKE TO CLARIFY THAT NO COMPULSORY LICENSE OF SOLIRIS WAS REQUESTED OR GRANTED IN BRAZIL 
* ALEXION PHARMACEUTICALS INC - CONTINUES TO HAVE PATENT APPLICATIONS PENDING IN BRAZIL THAT WOULD PROVIDE ADDITIONAL PROTECTION TO SOLIRIS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
